nickname.title: Choose your dropkitchen™ username.
nickname.help-warning: Must be at least 3 letters and contain only letters and numbers.
nickname.help-already: This username is already in use.

message.success: Your verification code has been sent.
message.fail: Verification failed. Please check whether the code entered is correct.
message.over: Oops, you've timed out. Please request a new verification code.

random.title: random box
random.desc:
Open the random box and
get the drop you've been wanting!!

modal.title: Receive notifications from dropkitchen
modal.context: Get notifications for drops, events, and other services.

modal.title:
Your friends and you both win!
Invite your friends and get a gift from Dropkitchen.
modal.context:
When a friend who isn't already a DropKit member signs up, you'll receive a random piece of DropKit digital art.
Every time a friend signs up, you'll receive 300 P.
